description: This file defines the interface and class declaration for the LocalStore component in the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. The class manages local database storage functionalities such as opening a database, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries, removing entries, and adding entries.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: A class implementing the ILocalStore interface, providing methods to manage local storage using SQLite database.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a connection to the database at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a table in the database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in the specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a specified range from a table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves entries from a table starting at a specific index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes a range of entries from a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a table.
